#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018
#Text=day four : Mexico beats Germany ; Serbia leads Group E , Brazil shares the spoils with Swiss
#Text=Tuesday , June 19 , 2018
#Text=On Sunday , day four of the 2018 FIFA football World Cup , Serbia defeated Costa Rica 1 – 0 , Brazil drew 1 – 1 against Switzerland , and defending champions Germany lost 1 – 0 against Mexico .
#Text=Group E — Costa Rica 0 – 1 Serbia
#Text=In the first game of Group E , Costa Rica faced Serbia at the Samara Arena .
#Text=Costa Rica 's Giancarlo González got an opportunity to score from a header in the 12th minute but the ball went over the crossbar .
#Text=A minute later , on Serbia 's attack , Aleksandar Mitrovic 's chance to put Serbia in the lead was saved .
#Text=The first half ended with 0 – 0 on the scoreboard .
#Text=In the second half , Serbia won a free kick in the 55th minute because of a foul by David Guzmán .
#Text=Serbia 's captain Aleksandar Kolarov scored from the free kick in the top right corner , which proved to be the winning goal of the match .
#Text=Nemanja Matić 's attempt in the 77th minute to double the lead was blocked .
#Text=Costa Rica had a few attempts as the match proceeded , but none were converted into a goal .
#Text=The match ended 1 – 0 as the Serbian side climbed to the top spot in the group .
#Text=This was Branislav Ivanovic 's 104th international match , and he is now the most capped Serbian international .
#Text=Aleksandar Kolarov won the Budweiser Man of the Match award .
#Text=After the match , he said , " The free-kick came in a difficult moment in the match and I knew I could step up and change things , and that 's exactly what I did . "
#Text=Group F — Germany 0 – 1 Mexico
#Text=The defending champions Germany took on Mexico in the first game of Group F in Moscow .
#Text=Germany had greater ball possession in the match .
#Text=Héctor Herrera 's 10th minute attempt from outside the goal was blocked by Manuel Neuer .
#Text=Both sides had multiple attempts for opening the scoring .
#Text=In the 35th minute , Hirving Lozano scored a goal from a right-footed shot , from Chicharito 's assist , putting the Mexicans in the lead .
#Text=The first half ended with Mexico leading 1 – 0 .
#Text=In the second half , multiple attempts by Joshua Kimmich , Julian Draxler , Toni Kroos , and Timo Werner went wide or were blocked .
#Text=Though with the greater all possession , Germany lost 1 – 0 to Mexico .
#Text=This was the fifth World Cup tournament for Rafael Márquez ; only two other players have played five .
#Text=In the last six World Cup tournaments , Mexico has never lost their first game , winning five of those .
#Text=It was the first defeat for Germany since losing to France in the UEFA Euro 2016 's semi-finals .
#Text=After the match , Germany 's coach Joachim Löw said " In the first half , we played very badly .
